org.yamcs.alarms

  • Classes in org.yamcs.alarms used by org.yamcs 
    Class and Description
    EventAlarmServer
    Handles alarms for events.
  • Classes in org.yamcs.alarms used by org.yamcs.alarms 
    Class and Description
    ActiveAlarm
    Keeps track of the alarm for one parameter or event.
    AlarmListener 
    AlarmSequenceException
    Used by AlarmServer to indicate that a specified alarm instance does not have the expected sequence number.
    AlarmServer
    Maintains a list of active alarms.
    CouldNotAcknowledgeAlarmException
    Used by AlarmServer to indicate when the acknowledge on an alarm did not work.
  • Classes in org.yamcs.alarms used by org.yamcs.http.api 
    Class and Description
    AlarmServer
    Maintains a list of active alarms.
    EventAlarmServer
    Handles alarms for events.

    Keeps track of the alarm for one parameter or event.
  • Classes in org.yamcs.alarms used by org.yamcs.parameter

    Maintains a list of active alarms.
  • Classes in org.yamcs.alarms used by org.yamcs.xtceproc 
    Class and Description
    AlarmReporter
    Generates alarm events for a processor, by subscribing to all relevant parameters.
    AlarmServer
    Maintains a list of active alarms.
